name: PEACE INDIA

address: Malti mangal Plaza, no.A/G - 13, Rambandhu talaw

briefDescription: PEACE INDIA (NGO) an INTERNATIONAL NGO Peace India is working with dedication for the Noble cause of  Communal Harmony , Justice for all, Economic upliftment of the underprivileged, Education, Public , health & legal awareness, Love, Peace, and Friendship, National & International Integration by Exchange of ideas & ethos amongst the neighboring countries and the people of the rest of the world. Peace India is a Social helping hand and an Organization for the ignored, disregarded, over- looked, victimized oppressed, depressed, tortured people of the Society and it cultivates awareness in them with regards to their RIGHTS and did lots of work for poor & needy people at ground level. On the other hand we are presently associated with Asansol
